entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is a character in the story who is snarling and speaking to someone. She mentions that half of the Order has been joined.

entities.name: order
entities.description: The Order is an organization mentioned by Bellatrix as being joined by half of its members.

entities.name: emmeline vance
entities.description: Emmeline Vance is a person who was captured and murdered due to information passed on by Snape.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is a person who was killed, with Snape giving credit to the other person for finishing him off.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a person mentioned by Bellatrix as someone Snape could have killed but didn’t.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a character in the story who is being questioned by Bellatrix about Harry Potter.

relationships.description: Bellatrix mentions that half of the Order has been joined.
Snape passed on information that led to Emmeline Vance's capture and murder.
Snape gave credit to the other person for finishing off Sirius Black.
Bellatrix mentions that Snape could have killed Harry Potter but didn’t.
